## RouteLocationOptions interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface RouteLocationOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [force](./vue-router.routelocationoptions.force.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Triggers the navigation even if the location is the same as the current one |
|  [replace](./vue-router.routelocationoptions.replace.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Replace the entry in the history instead of pushing a new entry |
|  [state](./vue-router.routelocationoptions.state.md) | <code>HistoryState</code> | State to save using the History API. This cannot contain any reactive values and some primitives like Symbols are forbidden. More info at TODO: link mdn |
